Ukraine carries out air assault on Crimea's port of FeodosiaUkraine carried out an air attack on Feodosia in Crimea, Ukraine's air force commander said on Tuesday, after the Russian-installed governor of the Crimea said that the assault sparked a fire in the town's port area. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 02:38:25 GMT JKEGUR5Z5ZJVHMA625IL7TX57M https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-carries-out-air-assault-crimeas-port-feodosia-2023-12-26/Reuters世界欧洲
US retaliates in Iraq after three US troops wounded in attackThe US military carried out retaliatory air strikes in Iraq after a one-way drone attack earlier in the day by Iran-aligned militants left one US service member in critical condition and wounded two other US personnel. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 02:30:07 GMT S5MIHANTOZMOJAI4EEGILE62GA https://www.reuters.com/world/ Three-us-troops-wounded-attack-iraq-us-retaliates-2023-12-26/Phil Stewart世界
Japan to impose sanctions on three senior Hamas membersThe Japanese government will freeze assets and impose sanctions on payments and capital transactions on three senior Hamas members, Chief Cabinet Secretary Yoshimasa Hayashi said on Tuesday. Mexican father spends Christmas hoping for family taken by Hurricane OtisCandido Trinidad de la Cruz had been planning a family Christmas celebration until Hurricane Otis hit two months ago and flooded the Mexican beach resort Acapulco, sweeping away his wife and two children, and all their belongings. Netanyahu vows no let-up in war but UN worker says Gazans have no place to goIsraeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu vowed to keep up the fight against Hamas militants, but a UN humanitarian team leader said Palestinian civilians who honor Israeli evacuation orders cannot be guaranteed safety. Displaced Gazans have little space left to go, UN aid worker saysMany Palestinians in the Gaza Strip have followed Israeli army evacuation orders and sought safety in designated areas only to find there is little space left in the densely populated enclave, a U.N. humanitarian team leader said on Monday. Israel's Netanyahu vows no let-up in war against Hamas as Gaza deaths mountLocal residents and Palestinian media said Israel stepped up air and ground shelling against al-Bureij refugee camp in central Gaza. At least 70 people were killed in an Israeli air strike targeting the Maghazi refugee camp, a Palestinian health ministry spokesperson said.
